title: Quanta
description: Quanta is the accounting service for software businesses who want to get their finances right, without delay. We’re a full-service, all-in-one accounting and tax solution. We’ve built our own accounting system that lets us keep you finances up to date in real-time. Since we’ve automated all the routine accounting work, we don't need offshore bookkeepers who operate on a several week lag. Instead, you work with an in-house software accounting expert in a dedicated Slack channel.
